movies.title: Stronger
movies.plot: A victim of the Boston Marathon bombing in 2013 helps the police track down the killers while struggling to recover from devastating trauma.

events.title: Jeff Bauman loses his legs in the Boston Marathon bombing

movies.title: Bobby
movies.plot: In 1968 the lives of a retired doorman, hotel manager, lounge singer, busboy, beautician and others intersect in the wake of Robert F. Kennedy's assassination at the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 22 nominations.
